feature_description: Alerting API, from the XQuery library module alert.xqy
Debugging, available only when debug level logging is enabled
Packaging features of the Configuration Manager
Public Key Infrastructure in support of SSL, from the XQuery library module pki.xqy
MarkLogic REST API and rest:* functions
Search API, from the XQuery library module search.xqy
SQL Data Modeling and ODBC interface
Mark Logic Server service layer, usually related to OS or system and network protocol errors.
X.509 certificates, in support of SSL
